trans-unit.source: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document.

Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause>.

For more information about the `<KeyInfo>` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> class.

Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> that represents a particular type of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> information to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
The number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
Returns an enumerator of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration.
Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.

Returns an enumerator of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects of the specified type in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration.
Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
The type of object to enumerate.
An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the key information identity.
The key information identity.
Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> state from an XML element.
The XML element from which to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> state.
The value parameter is `null`.
